extendedInfo.description: **PLEASE try the DEMO first to see if PGM will run on your device and get a feel for the features before you buy**** EMAIL US IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEM!  We usually can't fix persistent errors with an error report alone.  You need to contact us if you really truly want the error fixed! SECONDLY, if you haven't heard from us in 24 hours, email us again!****Check out FAQs on our website for common problems and fixes**Pocket Game Master (PGM) is a full featured android app tailored to Game Masters and players of almost any role-playing game.While fully functional for players, Pocket Game Master really shines in the hands of the Game Master. PGM allows the game master to not only create a complete adventure right from their device, but to run that adventure from the device as well!  Of course, players can use this for their character sheets, map dungeons, jot down dungeon notes, and use the dice.Best of all you can network between devices and interact in real time through Wifi or Bluetooth!!FEATURES: -Make, view and save 20 character sheets at a time.-Change almost any part to match your campaign. Add your own classes, feats, skills, spell, stats name and more!-Interactive stats allowing for in-game use, like tapping on damage to roll damage dice.-Write an adventure from scratch, add pictures, music, web content and more.-Basic dungeon map creating with unlimited undo/redo even AFTER saving.-Fog of War effect for maps-Initiative roller-Complete dice bag-Ability to customize most input to match your campaign. Including stat names, stat bonus, feat/skills/spell lists, classes, effects, "to hit" and "initiative" dice, just to name a few.-3 user countdown fields and 3 user saving throw fields per character. This allows for deeper campaign customization.-Full help manual -Networking to share character's info instantly. For example, if a monster hits a player for 3 damage, the Game Master can input the damage once, and the player's sheet will automatically update!Here are the permission explanations:WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: So you can save to SD CardCHECK_LICENSE: Android Market's license system which will not work without the ID (serial number) of your device (see below).READ_PHONE_STATE: Used to get the unique phone ID which is used to create an Android Market license.INTERNET: So you can connect your PGM to your friend's WiFi network. BLUETOOTH: So you can connect your PGM to a friend's PGM through bluetooth.tags: rpg dungeon game master d&d pathfinder c&c d20 character sheet roleplaying pen paper map

reviews.title: RPG Shell...
reviews.comment: This is a really good app for a Dungeons & Dragons type game. It could be used for other systems as well. $3 for a pocket RPG maker, you\'re crazy not to buy it. To use it for other systems will take you some time making the needed files. Easily done though.
reviews.author: Bronson Barnhart

reviews.title: Outstanding!
reviews.comment: E-mail them if you have a problem! They are very helpful. This app is great! IMPORTANT: read the help menu after you open it. There is a ton of helpful information in there. Good guy steve,  AWAY!!
reviews.author: Steven Smith

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app is great. It\'s eliminated 90% of the papers I needed as a GM and with the Adventure Tab I\'m able to create oodles of quest without having to spread out papers and books.  The use of \"loaders\" is really cool, adds flavour and a level of uniqueness to your games. Definitely checkout the demo, if you like it then buy it. Any problems contact the dev team, they care and stand by their product.

reviews.title: Great possibility
reviews.comment: I\'ve ran pen and paper campaigns for years, Although I cannot solely commit to this app as a DM here\'s my thoughts. limitless potential: the character sheet integration is a great concept and amazing from a players perspective. As a dm it lacks a bit. campaign tab great for quick notes and the loaders are a time saver. The dice bag is perfect in a pinch. I have no love for the map builder, but I tried. All in all a great app, the developer responded quickly to my ?\'s & I look forward to the future of the ap
